text:
I apologize if this has already been answered, but I am having an issue with creating a private app and developing it locally using react JS. I am trying to make some API calls, but I am getting an error saying `any of the listed authentication credentials are missing` with a list of credentials. I have my call set up with the correct authentication, and the call works in postman fine, any insight into resolving this? The list of missing credentials is as follows:

```service-to-service": "service-to-service not engaged. Metadata for service-to-service request not found.",
"hapikey": "hapikey not engaged. hapikey is not present in query params.",
"oauth-token": "oauth-token not engaged. OAuth access token not found in request header.",
"vendorkey-gae": "vendorkey-gae not engaged. Vendorkey not found in request headers.",
"internal-cookie": "internal-cookie not engaged. Cookie not found in the request.",
"app-cookie": "app-cookie not engaged. App cookie is not present on the request."```
